messages.title: Support is growing for JOHN LEECH
messages.content: John has and will be a visible active MP working hard for our area. More action: Standing up for our communities. Nurses and new parents helped during our MP's' work. Stood side-by-side with doctors to protect services and fought against cuts...

keyPolicies.policyDescription: John Leech will be a visible and active MP for South Manchester.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Odds are being slashed on John Leech winning South Manchester, straight fight between John and Labour.

issues.brexitEurope: Labour voted with UKIP to trigger a damaging Brexit.
issues.health: Stood side-by-side with doctors to protect services and fought against cuts.

community.content: More action: Standing up for our communities.

politicalExperience.achievements: Nurses and new parents helped during our MP's' work.

quotes.text: Labour’s leading Brexiteer Stephen Kinnock’s diary lined up Brexit with Theresa May like a prime ministerial poodle.
Labour’s leading Brexiteer Stephen Kinnock has been accused of making a deal with Theresa May to secure Brexit, risking the entire future of Britain.
